Boscia Luminizing Mask, Black Charcoal  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Boscia

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Glycereth-26, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Montmorillonite, Polysorbate 20, Charcoal Powder, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Cap

xtract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Extract, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Pinus Pinaster Bark Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Acrylates/Palmeth-25 Acrylate Copolymer, Acrylates Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbyl Glucoside,

Ascorbyl Glucoside, Diglycerin, Iron Oxides (CI 77499)

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
